name: Butter Chicken (Murgh Makhani)
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook in a tandoor or pan. Prepare the makhani gravy with butter, tomatoes, cream, and spices like kasuri methi. Add the cooked chicken to the gravy and simmer. Serve hot with naan or rice.

name: Palak Paneer
instructions: Blanch spinach and blend into a smooth puree. Sauté onions, garlic, and tomatoes. Add spices and the spinach puree. Simmer for a few minutes. Add paneer cubes and a splash of cream. Cook for another 2 minutes. Serve hot.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Whisk eggs, cheese, and pepper. Drain pasta. Mix egg mixture into hot pasta off heat. Add pancetta and pasta water.

name: Guacamole
instructions: Mash avocados. Add lime juice, onion, cilantro, salt, and pepper. Stir to combine.

name: Classic Pancakes
instructions: In a large bowl, mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In another bowl, whisk together milk, egg, and melted butter. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry and stir until just combined. Cook on a hot griddle until bubbles appear, then flip and cook until golden.

name: Hearty Beef Chili
instructions: In a large pot, brown the ground beef. Drain fat. Add chopped onion and bell pepper and cook until soft. Stir in chili powder, cumin, and oregano. Pour in canned tomatoes and kidney beans. Bring to a simmer and cook for at least 1 hour.

name: Chicken and Broccoli Stir-Fry
instructions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. In a small bowl, whisk together soy sauce, ginger, garlic, and cornstarch. Heat oil in a wok or large skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add broccoli florets and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes. Pour sauce over and cook until thickened.

name: Simple Lentil Soup
instructions: In a large pot, heat olive oil. Add chopped onion, carrots, and celery and cook until softened. Add garlic and cook for another minute. Stir in lentils, vegetable broth, and a bay leaf. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 25-30 minutes, or until lentils are tender. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). In a small bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt. In a large bowl, cream together butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar. Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla. Gradually beat in the dry ingredients. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 9 to 11 minutes.

name: Classic Tomato Bruschetta
instructions: Preheat your oven's broiler. Slice a baguette into 1/2-inch slices and arrange on a baking sheet. Broil until golden. Rub one side of each toast slice with a garlic clove. In a bowl, combine chopped tomatoes, fresh basil, minced garlic, and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Spoon the tomato mixture onto the toasts.
